revised_title: Shoulder Girdle Structure and Homologies in Ichthyosauria and Sauropterygia
tldr: The author, J. W. Hulke, discusses the structure of the shoulder girdle and the homologies of its parts in Ichthyosauria and Sauropterygia families. This study helps to understand the evolutionary relationships between these ancient marine reptiles.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
